name: Transit
body:
The project is for the millions of commuters who use mass transit around the world whom have mobile devices and can have fun while on the go, raising brand awareness while invoking a community to socially travel together using public transportation and have fun at the same time.

Commuters will be able to book taxi, flight, hotels, and bike services.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
